title: S.o.s. - Season of Shambles
description: Cold, all alone, no money -- a woman tries to put her life back together in a new city. She has enemies not so long ago forgotten, and emotions tucked away.Feeling safe and secure in her new location, and confident that she has eluded any present danger, Roberta carves out a new life, with new friends, and a hopeful future.But then the past comes to visit. Will the killer get Roberta?
author: Lee Ashe
